definition: transliteration (rendering phonetic value, e.g. of English words in Chinese characters)/characters giving phonetic value of Chinese word or name (when the correct characters may be unknown)/transcription (linguistics)/to transcribe phonetic symbols
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: The word Qita in the Korean language means China, which is a sound translation of Khitan, an ancient nationality in China.
sentences.chinese: 乞大是契丹的另一种音译，在这里指称中国。

sentences.english: Which phrase below is transliterated from English word?
sentences.chinese: 下列哪个词语是来自英文的音译词？

sentences.english: Qarhan is transliterated from Mongolian and interpreted as the World of Salt.
sentences.chinese: 察尔汗“是蒙古语的音译，意思是”盐的世界。

sentences.english: Zero translation of English scientific terms involves transliteration and transference.
sentences.chinese: 科技英语专业术语的零翻译主要表现为音译和移译。

sentences.english: This kind transliterates adds the transliteration law to be more ingenious.
sentences.chinese: 这种音译加意译法更为巧妙。

sentences.english: This paper gives a brief analysis on the phenomenon of the popular word "fans".
A program for transliterating SMS messages.
sentences.chinese: 一种程序，以便音译短信。

sentences.english: Transliterate a method to appear among them earlier, duration is longer also at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 其中音译方法出现较早，同时持续时间也较长。

sentences.english: Chinese localization of transliteration, which is the basis of standardization, has many methods.
sentences.chinese: 音译汉化有各种方式，是音译词规范的基础。

sentences.english: Chinese localization of transliteration, which is the basis of standardization, has many methods.
sentences.chinese: 音译汉化有各种方式，是音译词规范的基础。

sentences.english: Xiangba is the transliteration of woodcut from Tibetan language.
sentences.chinese: “祥巴”，藏语音译，意为木刻版画。

sentences.english: We propose two statistical models for identification of the transliteration word.
sentences.chinese: 但这首先要做的工作是识别音译词。

sentences.english: Benzilan, who is Tibetan, which means beautiful Shaba.
sentences.chinese: 奔子栏是藏语音译，意为美丽的沙坝。

sentences.english: Instead, the Egyptian pronunciation of his name is the norm for English transliteration.
sentences.chinese: 但是埃及阿拉伯语的读音则更接近于英语的音译。

sentences.english: Sudenly, I miss the friends in the other countries.
sentences.chinese: 外国友人们，若有音译不准请不要责怪我。

sentences.english: "Bu Tala" is the sound transliteration of ancient Indian Sanskrit, meaning "the holy land of Buddhism".
sentences.chinese: “布达拉”音译自古印度梵文，意思是“佛教圣地”。

definition: meaning (of foreign expression)/translation of the meaning (as opposed to literal translation 直譯|直译)/paraphrase/free translation
pronunciation/literary (rather than colloquial) pronunciation of a Chinese character
